narrative:
No noncompliant items were identified during this announced 
prelicense inspection. 
This is a 3rd Prelicense Inspection for a Class “A” 
license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the 
Applicant. The Applicant is ready to be licensed under the Animal Welfare Act.  A copy of your license will be sent to you 
without any additional action 
on your part. If you have not received your license within 30 days, please 
contact the USDA at 970-494-7478. 
 
End Section
